name: Livery - TOJam 2020
description:
Livery is a game where you take flight to deliver essential packages to island dwellers. Give a helping hand while the dwellers hole up inside waiting 'til they can come out again.

Livery was created May 8 - May 10th by Dylan North & Kamilla Usmanova (Team Pinwheel Hat)!

Dylan North: Programming, Art

https://www.artstation.com/dylannorth

https://www.instagram.com/dylantnorth/

https://twitter.com/dylantnorth

Kamilla Usmanova: Art

https://www.artstation.com/cusstard

---------

W/A to Control Pitch

S/D to Control Yaw

Space to Flap

Shift to Stop

Click to Drop
